body_html: I would recommend trying to redefine your code in such a way that your data can be same size. That will likely be the best way to avoid performance problems. Make sure you are not modifying the graph continually on every loop of training (you can finalize your graph to get an error if yout ry to do this). Without you sharing your code in the issue (or a simplified version that still has the problem), it's very unlikely we will be able to help you effectively (we're just guessing).
